id: This Slouchy (in a Good Way) Madewell Cotton Turtleneck Is Now $22
paragraph: As much as we love big, chunky sweaters for winter, no cold-weather wardrobe would be complete without a lightweight turtleneck. Ideal for layering under cardigans or blazers, it can even be worn on its own on milder days. This tissue-thin Madewell version — which we’re happy to report is now 30 percent off — adds warmth, but not bulk, to any outfit.
